column4: I just did another complete install of 9.04 and still have problems networking. Wiki's, and googling has not helped. Anyone know how to properly set up networking?
what exactly do you want to setup it like?
I have both a wired and wireless, the desktop icon for Network manager indicates a wireless connection, but I'm connected using the wired and can't figure how to set up the wireless.

When I right click network manager, connection information, it says "no valid active connections found" but I can browse. I need this computer to use it's wireless connection, but when I try to set it up I lose all connectivity.
